comment: A singleton is a set. Theorem 7.12 of [Quine] p. 51, proved using Extensionality, Separation, Null Set, and Pairing. See also ~ snexALT . (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
